displayed_text:
[Question]

What is your opinion on internet influencers (e.g., streamers, bloggers, short video creators) increasingly becoming a recognized profession?

answer.text_box: I have mixed feelings. I believe content creators producing good quality content such as teaching something for instance are great and in this case I believe it makes sense to see it as a profession. But when I see people creating content based on stupidity, that's another story.
